overview: Professor Pollack takes us on a fantastic voyage through water, showing us a hidden universe teeming with physical activity that provides answers so simple that any curious person can understand. In conversational prose, Pollack lays a simple foundation for understanding how changes in water's structure underlie most energetic transitions of form and motion on earth.
tagline: Dr. Gerald Pollack talks about the Fourth Phase of Water, which is also the title of his newly released book.  From the NPA20 conference
title: The Fourth Phase of Water
